column4: I am having problems installing ia32-libs on my amd64 desktop system, can anybody help me resolve this? ( dpkg: error processing /var/cache/apt/archives/ia32-libs_2.7ubuntu6.1_amd64.deb (--unpack): unable to create `./usr/lib32/libGL.so.1.2': No such file or directory )
do you have free disk space ?
Yes I have more than 400gb free :(
Hm I have the proprietary nvidia drivers installed, googling the problem makes it seem like a conflict?
